prod_desc.heading: Why buy HP Chromebook 14a-na0002tu Celeron Chrome OS Laptop
features: Intel Celeron N4020 Processor for smooth performance
14-Inch HD Touch Display ensures true clarity in visuals
4GB LPDDR4 SDRAM empowers you to do multitasking
Intel UHD Graphics 600 to play games with ease
sub_features: Get the responsive performance you're looking for when you buy HP Chromebook 14a-na0002tu Celeron Chrome OS Laptop. It has a powerful storage capacity and efficient RAM which lets you store a huge amount of important data and enjoy lag-free operation respectively. The powerful Intel Celeron N4020 Processor is a superbly fast processor that takes your productivity, creativity to a whole new level and never lets you slow down. The powerful Processor along with Chrome OS operating system helps you perform your regular activities along with fun games.

Redefine how you work and play as the HP Chromebook 14a-na0002tu Celeron Chrome OS Laptop features a 14-Inch HD Touch Display which comes with a resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels. It ensures you never miss out on a detail. The brilliant HD display allows you to enjoy watching videos and playing games with full clarity. It is having B&O audio; Dual speakers, it delivers amazing audio quality. You can watch movies and play your favourite games on this laptop for experiencing an amazing audio and visual experience where the quality of your entertainment is not compromised. It ensures your efficiency levels are always on point.

Soar high in productivity by getting the HP Chromebook 14a-na0002tu Celeron Chrome OS Laptop online. It comes with 64GB eMMC, 100GB Cloud, 256GB expandable storage to make it more efficient and productive which lets you store your important official data and videos. It comes with 4GB LPDDR4 SDRAM makes sure you can multitask between different tabs providing you with lightning-fast responsiveness. While the Intel UHD Graphics 600 gives you a smooth gaming experience. So, wait no more! Purchase the HP Chromebook 14a-na0002tu Celeron Chrome OS Laptop online, right now!

faqs.que: How long do HP laptops last?
faqs.ans: Most experts estimate a laptop's lifespan to be three to five years. It may survive longer than that, but its utility will be limited as the components become less capable of running advanced applications.

The first number in the naming convention refers to the generation of the line, and the last two numbers reference the netbooks' size. Both machines offer an Intel Atom N455 processor and Intel GMA 3150 graphics, but the Mini includes a three-cell battery. The newer 210 packs a six-cell option.

faqs.que: How long does an HP laptop charge?
faqs.ans: When you buy a new laptop, you'll want to charge your battery for 24 hours to make sure that it gets a full charge on its first go. Giving your battery a complete charge during its first charge will prolong its life.

It is no surprise that HP laptops get sluggish after a particular time. Like any other laptop, there are also some tips and solutions for enhancing your laptop's performance. In this guide, you will have all the possible fixes and tips for your slow HP laptop.
